description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Error Reporting Service elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-26169):

1. Download and apply the updates corresponding to your Windows version from the official Microsoft Update Catalog linked below.
2. Restart your system to implement the changes.

**Details**:
- The following updates are available to mitigate the issue:
  - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (x64): [KB5035845](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035845)
  - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 (x64): [KB5035845](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035845)
  - For Windows 10 (x64): [KB5035858](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035858)
  - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 (x64): [KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is backed up before performing updates.
- Check compatibility with your current Windows build numbers:
  - 10.0.22631.3296 (Windows 11 Version 23H2)
  - 10.0.22621.3296 (Windows 11 Version 22H2)
  - 10.0.22000.2836 (Windows 11 Version 21H2)
  - 10.0.10240.20526 (Windows 10 for x64 and 32-bit systems)
